last_episode_to_air.name: Gangland
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tensions between two teen rivals leads to an altercation. The inmates meet former gang members and see murder victims at the police morgue as they reflect on their spell in prison.

name: Banged Up: Teens Behind Bars
overview: Eight British teen tearaways are incarcerated in one of America's toughest jails in a bid to divert them from a life of crime.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: The teens get a brutal introduction to prison life. They are put to work in the kitchen and laundry alongside real inmates. By the end of the first morning one of them is in tears, wanting to go home.

episodes.name: Prisoners at War
episodes.overview: The prison officers crank up the pressure as the teens work on a chain gang in searing Florida heat, and speak with young adults charged with murder

episodes.name: Gangland
episodes.overview: Tensions between two teen rivals leads to an altercation. The inmates meet former gang members and see murder victims at the police morgue as they reflect on their spell in prison.
